SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN if [ ! -f "&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#" ] ; then echo "&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT# does not exist. Maybe application was not exist before." exit 0 fi
output=`cat "&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#"` echo "$output"
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Standalone" if [ "`echo "$output" | grep "MARKER_FILE:"`" ] ; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# was deployed using Deployment Scanner" marker=`echo "$output" | sed 's/MARKER_FILE://'` touch "$marker" exit 0 fi :ENDIF
if [ ! -f "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#/content" ] ; then echo "Backup file &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#/content does not exist. Maybe application was not exist before." exit 0 fi
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain" if [ -z "`echo "$output" | grep "SERVER_GROUP:"`" ] ; then echo "Can not find SERVER_GROUP. Rollback failed. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi :ENDIF

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:PSET &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS1# = ""
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"SERVER_GROUP:*") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &RET# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : PSET &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS1# = STR_SUB(&RET#,"SERVER_GROUP:","") :ENDPROCESS
:SET &HND1# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"MARKER_FILE:*") :PROCESS &HND1# : SET &RET# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#,1) ! Skip the next task because application has now been deployed using marker file : PSET &UC4RB_JBOSS_APPLN_DEPLOYED# = "FALSE" :ENDPROCESS
:SET &HND2# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*does not exist.*") :PROCESS &HND2# : SET &RET# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,1) : PSET &UC4RB_JBOSS_APPLN_DEPLOYED# = "FALSE" :ENDPROCESS
